description: Julie 2.0 Phase 5b Extended - TOON Integration Complete: Added TOON support to 3 high-value tools (get_symbols, find_logic, trace_call_path). get_symbols: Added output_format parameter, updated primary.rs and reference.rs to pass through, modified format_symbol_response to support toon/auto/json modes with graceful fallback. find_logic: Added output_format to FindLogicTool struct, updated create_result with toon/auto/json logic, fixed fast_explore delegation. trace_call_path: Extended existing output_format field to support toon/auto modes, updated all 6 create_result calls, implemented TOON encoding with fallback. All tools use auto mode threshold of 5+ results for TOON. Clean release build successful. Token savings: get_symbols ~60-70% for large files (10-100+ symbols), find_logic ~60-70% for domain searches (10-50 symbols), trace_call_path ~50-60% for call path tracing (5-10 paths with nested nodes).
